title: Tumbleweed rolls in with their second model, the Stargazer drop bar Mountain Touring Bike
content:
Apart from the full-squish, all-carbon, KOM-at-all-costs crowd, there is a growing segment of riders who just want to get away. Load everything up on your bike, head out of town, and camp out under the stars. For that crowd, bikes like the new Tumbleweed Stargazer are just the ticket. Starting with a heat-treated multi-butted chromoly [â€¦]

The post Tumbleweed rolls in with their second model, the Stargazer drop bar Mountain Touring Bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
